item.title: USDA issues order for raw milk samples nationwide to be tested for bird flu
item.description: Raw samples nationwide will now be collected and shared with the U.S. Department of Agriculture to test for bird flu, according to a new federal order...

item.title: Daniel Penny jury deadlocked on manslaughter charge in subway chokehold case
item.description: The jury was 'unable to come to a unanimous vote' on Daniel Penny's manslaughter charge over the subway chokehold death of Jordan Neely.
